verses.roman:
nṛsiṁhānandera āge āvirbhūta hañā
bhojana karilā, tāhā śuna mana diyā

synonyms: nṛsiṁhānandera—the brahmacārī known as Nṛsiṁhānanda; āge—before; āvirbhūta hañā—appearing; bhojana karilā—He accepted offerings of food; tāhā—that; śuna—hear; mana diyā—with attention.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu appeared before Nṛsiṁhānanda Brahmacārī and ate his offerings. Please hear about this with attention.
